select city_name, storeno,store_name, area_no, area_name,employee_a_no, employee_a_name, sum(pesgmv) pesgmv,pubseas,(sum(pesgmv) +pubseas) as totalsum from ds_areatrade where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
and storeno IN (${storeids})
and area_no in (${areano})
group by employee_a_no
mapper.delete: delete from ds_areatrade where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
mapper.update: update ds_areatrade set pubseas = #{pubseas} where year =#{year} and month =#{month} and storeno = #{storeno}
mapper.insert: insert into ds_areatrade_store ( city_name,storeno,store_name,pesgmv,other_order_amount,other_order_count, other_returned_amount,other_returned_count,year,month,createtime ) select city_name, storeno, store_name, (sum(other_order_amount) - sum(other_returned_amount)) as pesgmv, sum(other_order_amount) other_order_amount, sum(other_order_count) other_order_count, sum(other_returned_amount) other_returned_amount, sum(other_returned_count) other_returned_count, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)) as year , MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)) as month , NOW() as createtime from ds_areatrade where year =#{year} and month =#{month} group by storeno
